name: Gift of Life: Key of Solomon
description: In Damascus the ancient manuscripts written about the existence of a mysterious tomb of the great king Solomon in Jerusalem area. For many years they tried to find her, but not for the sake of interest, and in order to win the heart of the tomb.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
